issue.title: [C++][Docs] Improve C++ Cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17851](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17851). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
1. Add ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE to utility macros.
1. Use auto when it improves readability.
1. Adopt C++ 14/17's idioms.
1. Add Visitor classes to visitor pattern.
